alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bradford, northeastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sampson, or 9 miles west of Keystone Heights, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Melrose, George`s Lake, New River, Lake Geneva, Camp Blanding, Orange Heights, Kingsley and Sampson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
